content:
Create a CSS code that not only makes the text "BigText" bold but also increases its font size by 3pt. Additionally, the code should include a hover effect that changes the text color to red when the cursor is placed over it. Finally, the code should be responsive and adjust the font size to fit the screen size of different devices. Please refer to the table below for the required font size adjustments for different screen sizes.
| Screen Size | Font Size |
|-------------|-----------|
| <576px      | 24pt      |
| 576-768px   | 30pt      |
| 769-992px   | 36pt      |
| 993-1200px  | 42pt      |
| >1200px     | 48pt      |
